items.title: NBCC shares to track pact with HUDCO for 10-acre Noida plot at Rs 600 crore project cost
items.description: NBCC has an order book of around Rs 84,000 crore, and the company is targetting to take it to Rs 1 lakh crore by the end of this financial year.

items.title: Waaree Renewable in focus on order worth Rs 1,233.5 crore for solar PV project
items.description: Waaree Renewable Technologies Share Price | Currently, the stock is trading 53.15 percent below its 52-week high and 426.72 percent above its 52-week low.

items.title: Stock of the Day|Galaxy Surfactants- Play on preference for Oleochemicals vs. crude oil-based ingredients|
items.description: Leading oleochemical company catering to personal and home care products. Gets more than 50 percent of sales from the MNC customers like P&G, Unilever and Colgate. Due to its end clients largely in the FMCG industry, it is seen as a defensive play in the chemicals sector. While domestic business is sluggish due to tapering in Urban demand, international businesses are on a better footing.

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty suggests a flat opening; US markets fall, Asia trade flat
items.description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates: Wall Street's main indexes closed lower on Wednesday, with the Nasdaq leading declines, as technology stocks slumped on Thanksgiving eve on worries the Federal Reserve may be cautious about rate cuts after stubbornly strong U.S. inflation data.

items.title: UBS predicts Paytm to hit adjusted EBITDA breakeven by Q4, doubles price target
items.description: Just last week, Bernstein’s also hiked its price target Paytm, marking a shift in discussions from survival risks to debates over the firm's bull and bear case scenarios.
